ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(ISBLANK(Term_of_Lease_Years__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Term_of_Lease_Months__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Term_of_Lease_Days__c )) ), AND(ISBLANK(Term_of_Lease_Months__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Term_of_Lease_Years__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Term_of_Lease_Days__c )) ), AND(ISBLANK(Term_of_Lease_Days__c ), NOT(ISBLANK(Term_of_Lease_Months__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Term_of_Lease_Years__c)) ), AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Term_of_Lease_Days__c )), NOT(ISBLANK(Term_of_Lease_Months__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Term_of_Lease_Years__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only one "Term of Lease" can be filled in at a time!
